subtitles.text: What's the difference between these words?
subtitles.chinese: 这两个词有什么区别？

subtitles.text: So travel is normally a verb. It can refer to short or long distances.
subtitles.chinese: 所以旅行通常是一个动词。它可以指短距离或长距离。

subtitles.text: How do you travel to work? I'm off to travel around the world.
subtitles.chinese: 您是如何出差上班的？我要去环游世界了。

subtitles.text: We do have a noun, travels, and we use it in phrases like
subtitles.chinese: 我们有一个名词，旅行，我们在短语中使用它，比如

subtitles.text: go on your travels or be off on your travels.
subtitles.chinese: 去旅行，或者去旅行。

subtitles.text: George is off on his travels around Asia.
subtitles.chinese: 乔治正在亚洲旅行。

subtitles.text: I wrote a book about my travels around Africa.
subtitles.chinese: 我写了一本关于我在非洲旅行的书。

subtitles.text: You can also use travel as a noun to talk about the concept of travel.
subtitles.chinese: 您还可以使用旅行作为名词来谈论旅行的概念。

subtitles.text: Travel broadens the mind.
subtitles.chinese: 旅行开阔了思维。

subtitles.text: Journey is a noun and refers to the process of travelling from A to B.
subtitles.chinese: 旅程是一个名词，指的是从A到B的过程。

subtitles.text: Bye! Have a safe journey!
subtitles.chinese: 一路平安!

subtitles.text: You can also have a metaphorical journey.
subtitles.chinese: 你也可以有一个隐喻的旅程。

subtitles.text: Life is a journey.
subtitles.chinese: 人生是一段旅程。

subtitles.text: Trip is also a noun and includes the journey and the activities you do.
subtitles.chinese: 旅程也是一个名词，包括旅程和您所做的活动。

subtitles.text: It's common in these phrases.
subtitles.chinese: 这在这些短语中很常见。

subtitles.text: Business trip, day trip, school trip, work trip.
subtitles.chinese: 商务差旅、一日游、学校旅行、商务差旅。

subtitles.text: I'm away on a business trip this weekend.
subtitles.chinese: 我这个周末要出差。

subtitles.text: Tour is also a noun and it's when you visit several different places, often on holiday.
subtitles.chinese: 旅游也是一个名词，当您参观几个不同的地方时，通常是在度假时。

subtitles.text: I'm going on a tour around South America. We visit five countries.
subtitles.chinese: 我要去南美洲巡回演出。我们访问了五个国家。

subtitles.text: What other words relating to travel confuse you?
subtitles.chinese: 还有哪些与旅行相关的词语让您感到困惑？
